channel.title: yoyogi on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in yoyogi on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Great fun in Yoyogi with MKP Japan group
item.description: 15:38 Monday 05 August 2019 JST I was soooo tired after last night that I did not write about the great day we had in Yoyogi Park.

item.title: Hung out with Lisa and Jorge in Yoyogi Park
item.description: 01:43 Wednesday 30 August 2017 JST Hung out with Lisa and Jorge in Yoyogi park tonight. Had invited some other people, but they weren’t available for various reasons. Lisa arrived first and she and I chatted until Jorge arrived. Kinda like a life-sized ouija board, we found a perfect spot in the grass beyond the lakes. Sat and chatted for four hours! Such a nice evening getting to know them better.

item.title: great hot workout with SOGO
item.description: 14:46 Sunday 27 August 2017 JST went to workout with SOGO today in Yoyogi park. So hot! But still fun, though at times I felt kinda close to passing out.

item.title: Caroline lecture
item.description: last night (written 07:39 Monday 05 June 2017 JST) Two weeks ago, I chose the location for Caroline’s presentation yesterday. The setting worked out quite well, for those people who were able to find it. Seems that a couple people were lost in the park. Lin came to the lecture as well. yay! I’m glad she really enjoyed it, and could witness some of the reactions people had (crying) when meeting/greeting Caroline.

item.title: Climbing trees in Yoyogi Park
item.description: 20:49 Saturday 08 August 2015 JST Satomi said her friend Kenji liked to climb trees so we should all do so! Today was the day; we met in Yoyogi Park at 4pm. At first it was Satomi and Zakky, and then I showed up and we went into Yoyogi. Kenji and his wife Sherry (sp) came as well, and their friend Ozan lives nearby so joined the fun. He said he wasn’t good at climbing trees, but we had fun playing badmitton and throwing a hard tennis ball at velcro mitts.
